metadata.name: Finance Type (category)
metadata.description: This codelists exists to group the Finance Type codelist into categories. It is not used as a codelist in its own right.

0.name: NON FLOW ITEMS
0.description: Non resource flow items requested on DAC table 1

1000.name: GUARANTEES AND OTHER UNFUNDED CONTINGENT LIABILITIES

200.name: INTEREST SUBSIDY
200.description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

300.name: CAPITAL SUBSCRIPTION
300.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

400.name: LOAN
400.description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

500.name: EQUITY  AND SHARES IN COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT VEHICLES

600.name: DEBT RELIEF
600.description: Debt cancellations, debt conversions, debt rescheduling within or outside the framework of the Paris Club.

700.name: INVESTMENT
700.description: Investment made by a private entity resident in a reporting country to acquire or add to a lasting interest(1) in an enterprise in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients.

800.name: BONDS
800.description: Acquisition of bonds issued by developing countries.
